backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping Valentine UI features to involved files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing main frontend files such as App.tsx, index.css, and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining color variables, theming, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main Valentine UI component with evasive No button logic, Yes confirmation state, and romantic styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks managing Internet Identity auth flow, stored identity, and login lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Romantic-themed Tailwind base styles and utilities with OKLCH pink palette and dark mode variants.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color/theme settings, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and requirements for a Valentine-themed interactive web page featuring a Yes/No prompt, evasive No button, and a celebratory meme on Yes.
